visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled mode enabled and use the a11y module. The x-axis should display categories for each month from January to December. The y-axis should represent temperature data in degrees Celsius. The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, with a specific marker enabled only for the month of April. The chart should have custom colors for the series and axes labels, with a light gray background and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart is set to use styled mode and includes the a11y module for accessibility. The x-axis displays categories for each month from January to December, with labels styled in a dark gray color and a font size of 12px. The y-axis represents temperature data in degrees Celsius, with a title styled in dark gray and a font size of 14px, and labels also styled in dark gray with a font size of 12px. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a specific marker enabled only for the month of April. The series color is set to a custom pink shade (#FF6384), and markers are generally disabled except for the specified point. The chart background is set to a light gray color (#F5F5F5), and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
